Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), its module and 1MW system using CH4 fuel are designed.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: The performance data of the SOFC system is calculated over a wide range of working temperatures and steam to carbon ratios (S/C).
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: For the calculation, over-potential and electrolyte resistance values at a lower temperature than 1000 degrees C are assumed to be as the same as those actually obtained at 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: The SOFC system was evaluated using measures of cost and energy payback times (CPT, EPT).
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: The calculation results using thermodynamic data showed that the generation efficiency of SOFC increased with the decrease of the working temperature.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: A lower temperature operation of SOFC shortened the CPT and EPT, because it enabled the application of lower cost materials, the size-reduction of equipment and the improvement of unit fuel consumption for the SOFC system.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: The lowering of S/C was also important to decrease the CPT and EPT.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation

Sentencas: The evaluation results indicated that operating conditions of S/C=1.0 similar to 1.5 and the working temperature lower than 800 degrees C were target values to realize the SOFC system.
Titulo: Study on high efficiency operation-conditions of solid oxide fuel cell and its system evaluation
